pretty face, but she's not very sociable. She tends to stay at home, so I don't usually see her around.

75076.<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>「東の高台じゃ:
There's an unexplained collapse on the high ground to the east, a strange man seems to be hanging around, and
there's something strange going on in the Town of Celed these days. Something bad is going on in the Town
of Celed these days.

75077.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「私は おカネが大好:
<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>I love money. When I look at the money
I've been entrusted with, I can forget
about the sad things I've done.<bw_break>

75078.<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>「……最近 あまり眠:
<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>I haven't been able to sleep much
lately, so I don't feel like working.
Welcome, welcome.<bw_break>

75079.<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>「ウチには もうひと:
We had another store keeper, but he suddenly disappeared. We're shorthanded, we can't get any work
done, and it's a real problem.

75080.<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>「このカウンター ひ:
<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>This counter is too big for one
person. I'd feel a little safer if
there was someone next to me. Well...<bw_break>

85020.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「神父さまも おつら:
<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>Father must be in a lot of pain, but
he doesn't show any sign of it. I must
do my duty too.<bw_break>

75081.<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>「……旅人のア:
You, the traveler, have a family, don't you? If something happens to them, you should cherish the companionship to help each other
so that they won't be sad.

75082.<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>「この宿屋 将来 生:
I built this inn over the years, saving up money so that I wouldn't have to worry about living in the
future. It doesn't mean anything anymore. Now, let's see...

75083.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「言葉を 伝えたい相:
<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>I envy you that you have someone to whom you
want to convey your words. I don't have anyone
like that anymore.<bw_break>

75085.<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>「この町は ダ:
This town was built as a resting place for ascetics and travelers going to Alltrades Abbey. Did you come for the
temple too?

75086.<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>「おや。神殿が目:
If you're not looking for a temple, then perhaps you have something to do in this town? There's nothing here but
the River of Light.

75087.<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>「それなら こ:
Then take the exit northwest of town and go to the top of the mountain, you will never forget the divine sight of
Alltrades Abbey.

75088.<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>「あら ウチの:
Oh, you don't want to talk to our master, do you? I'm sorry, I'm out of the office right now. My daughter just
came home, but she's a bit difficult. She tends to stay indoors these days.

75089.<pc>は 石碑に刻まれた\n文字を読んだ。:
<pc> read the inscription on
the stone monument.

75090.<center>ここは 光の河をたたえる セレドの地。\n我らセレドの民 光の河:
This is the land of Celed, where the River of Light is honored. We, the people of Celed, are destined to
prosper and live together with the River of Light.

87784.<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>「うちのダーリン 以:
My darling used to come to visit me every day with flowers, but lately she hasn't come at all. I guess it's tough
to be in a relationship with a sick girlfriend. Darling, I will miss you.

75094.<attr><feel_sad_lv3><end_attr>「あの日……重体の患:
I realized how helpless I was that day when many critically ill patients were brought to this clinic. I am not sure
I can continue to be a doctor any longer.

75095.<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>「ここは 重病:
